dcterms:creator: Ryan Lowe
Yi Wu
Aviv Tamar
Jean Harb
Pieter Abbeel
Igor Mordatch
dcterms:description: A set of cooperative and competitive 2D tasks with a dense reward signal, offering both partially and fully observable variants and scenarios that involve communication.
dcterms:title: Multi-agent Particle Environment (MPE)

dcterms:creator: Mikayel Samvelyan
Tabish Rashid
Christian Schroeder de Witt
Gregory Farquhar
Nantas Nardelli
Tim G. J. Rudner
Chia-Man Hung
Philiph H. S. Torr
Jakob Foerster
Shimon Whiteson
dcterms:description: A complex cooperative partially observable problem where individual agents of the same team have to defeat the opponent team in a short skirmish, introduced to study whether agents could learn complex behaviours such as kiting.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:creator: Nolan Bard
Jakob N. Foerster
Sarath Chandar
Neil Burch
Marc Lanctot
H. Francis Song
Emilio Parisotto
Vincent Dumoulin
Subhodeep Moitra
Edward Hughes
Iain Dunning
Shibl Mourad
Hugo Larochelle
Marc G. Bellemare
Michael Bowling
dcterms:description: An environment that comes from a board game where players must decide whether to play a card or give a clue to a teammate, well suited to study reasoning, beliefs, and intentions of other players.
dcterms:title: Hanabi Learning Environment (HLE)

dcterms:description: A collaborative multi-agent reinforcement learning environment focused on coordination-critical tasks, where agents depend on each other to make progress.
dcterms:title: Laser Learning Environment (LLE)
